definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: However he now has a chance to revive the embers of his career with Lecce.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，他有機會在萊切發揮自己職業生涯的餘熱。

sentences.english: Allegri wants to break taboo against Lecce.
sentences.chinese: 阿萊格里希望打破對萊切的魔咒。

sentences.english: It will take something very special to avoid relegation.
sentences.chinese: 由此可見，要想避免降級，萊切得好好費些思量。

sentences.english: People laughed, mostly because everyone liked Dean Fletcher.
sentences.chinese: 大家都笑了，主要是因爲每個人都喜歡弗萊切主任。

sentences.english: AC Milan communicates that Massimo Oddo has been allowed to join US Lecce on loan.
sentences.chinese: C米蘭宣佈已經同意奧多租借至萊切。

sentences.english: Ms. Louise Frechette, Deputy Secretary-General of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國常務副祕書長弗萊切特女士。

sentences.english: The Portugese wingback arrives from Roma to the Apulian team on loan.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙邊後衛將從羅馬租借至萊切俱樂部。

sentences.english: The former Premiership star will therefore miss Wednesday's match at Serie A strugglers Lecce.
sentences.chinese: 這位前英超球星將缺席本週三客場對萊切的意甲聯賽。

sentences.english: Leicester and Leeds also finished on 33 points.
sentences.chinese: 萊切斯特和利茲聯在那個賽季與狼隊同積33分。
